title: Ruby and the Naughty Cats
description: Whenever Ruby and her friends start to play, five NAUGHTY kittens get in the way! They ruin a race, mess up the clothes, and follow Ruby, Blue, and Blanket wherever they go. Then Blanket comes up with a bright "it will be less fuss, if we just let the naughty cats join in with us!" Jane Hisseys charming story and adorable characters will delight toddlers.
author: Jane Hissey
